function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Investors using alternate options to park their funds due to economic deterioration","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion spread as individuals gather in alternative investment venues","Mitigation":"Encourage digital or remote investment platforms to reduce physical gatherings","Technologies":"Digital investment platforms, remote banking technologies","People":"Individual investors, fund managers, financial regulators","Owner":"Financial institutions, regulatory bodies, investment platforms"},{"Description":"Declining yields on treasury instruments due to extreme pressure on public finances from Covid-19","Impact":"Increased financial risk as traditional safe-haven investments deliver lower returns","Mitigation":"Diversify investment portfolios to include alternative assets with higher yield potential","Technologies":"Investment analytics, risk management tools","People":"Investors, fund managers, financial analysts","Owner":"Investment firms, asset management companies, financial advisors"},{"Description":"Variation in fund returns reflecting the impact of systemic shocks like Covid-19","Impact":"Increased uncertainty and volatility in investment performance, potentially leading to panic selling and market instability","Mitigation":"Implement dynamic risk management strategies to hedge against systemic shocks","Technologies":"Algorithmic trading, risk modeling software, real-time market data analytics","People":"Investors, fund managers, financial analysts","Owner":"Investment firms, asset management companies, financial regulators"}]}
